content: Hi all - I'm trying to fix a small diagnostic issue for warnings when imports are unused. I'm working with a method check_import(&mut self, id: ast::NodeId) that helps figure out this situation, and I'd like to use the NodeId given to find the name of the import it's checking. Is there an easy way to do this (i.e., go from NodeId to more information about what that node represents or any idents related)? Thank you!

On another note in case this question is not easily answerable, does anyone know which contributors/maintainers might be most familiar with diagnostics and resolution, that I could reach out to, or other forums/chat where I could ask around?
Vadim Petrochenkov is probably the most familiar with resolution, Esteban KÃ¼ber is familiar with diagnostics
